pages.text: The Current Transformer is a measurement device for electrical power. It can be hooked up in any powerline and will keep track of energy transferred through it, returning an average Flux/t upon right-click.

The Energy Meter is an advanced, minitaurized version of the Current Transformer. It has a screen, so you can see the average Flux/t rate from far away. Using it requires setting up inputs and outputs, and attaching $(l:transportation/power_transportation#wireconnector)Wire Connectors$() - right-click it to configure it.
